U

UDPReceiver - Class in netWork
 
UDPReceiver(NetWorkInterface) - Constructor for class netWork.UDPReceiver
The UDPReceiver need to communicate with the networkInterface in order to give him every message received This constructor create the socket on the port receiver common to every use of the chat to be able to communicate all together.
UDPSender - Class in netWork
 
UDPSender() - Constructor for class netWork.UDPSender
Create a new socket in order to send message on UDP We use our own IP Address and a port not really important
User - Class in netWork
 
User(String, InetAddress) - Constructor for class netWork.User
A user is caracterized by his nick name and his address IP
userName - Static variable in class controller.Controller
